questions.questionTitle: What is the main purpose of the discussion?

anwers: He can't book a flight to Tokyo.
There was a sudden change of plans.

questions.questionTitle: What will the woman probably do next?

script:
� Melanie, help! I've got a problem with the company basketball tickets for tonight's game.
� What's the matter?
� I booked our suite last month to take our Tokyo partners to tonight's game. But Mr. Bradley called a few minutes ago, and he needs the suite for important clients on the Pennington account. I've already invited the Tokyo guys to the game. What should I do?
� Let me call my friend at Boomington's. Their company suite is next to ours. Maybe I can round up a couple of extra tickets.
